blogPost.title: Is it possible to feel isolated as the leader of a business? Answer by @sabrinahorn, Founder CEO at HORN Strategy. https://t.co/2NSoOk64RV https://t.co/RBTL92zx4g
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: ビジネスのリーダーとして孤立感を感じることはありますか？Answer by @sabrinahorn, Founder CEO at HORN Strategy. https://t.co/2NSoOk64RV https://t.co/RBTL92zx4g
作为一个企业的领导者，是否有可能感到孤立无援？回答者：@sabrinahorn，HORN战略公司的创始人CEO。https://t.co/2NSoOk64RV https://t.co/RBTL92zx4g
作爲一個企業的領導者，是否有可能感到孤立無援？回答者：@sabrinahorn，HORN戰略公司的創始人CEO。https://t.co/2NSoOk64RV https://t.co/RBTL92zx4g

previous.title: Should parents limit their children's screen time? Answer by @tamibhaumik, VP of Marketing & Digital Civility at Roblox. https://t.co/T4yTr97y3K https://t.co/wex9mfaLLR

localize.full_text: 親は子どものスクリーンタイムを制限すべきか？Roblox社のマーケティング＆デジタル・シビリティー担当副社長、@tamibhaumik氏による回答です。https://t.co/T4yTr97y3K https://t.co/wex9mfaLLR
父母应该限制他们孩子的屏幕时间吗？回答者：@tamibhaumik，Roblox的营销& 数字文明副总裁。https://t.co/T4yTr97y3K https://t.co/wex9mfaLLR
父母應該限制他們孩子的屏幕時間嗎？回答者：@tamibhaumik，Roblox的營銷& 數字文明副總裁。https://t.co/T4yTr97y3K https://t.co/wex9mfaLLR

next.title: What is some good career advice for members of Gen Z, as they enter the working world? Answer by @RobKingyens, Founder & CEO at https://t.co/FmvM87k26i. https://t.co/l1X7tMGCQe https://t.co/X0BZiRNW0Y

localize.full_text: Z世代のメンバーが社会人になる際に、キャリアに関する良いアドバイスはありますか？回答者： @RobKingyens, Founder & CEO at https://t.co/FmvM87k26i. https://t.co/l1X7tMGCQe https://t.co/X0BZiRNW0Y
对于Z世代的成员，在他们进入工作领域时，有什么好的职业建议？回答者：@RobKingyens, 创始人& CEO at https://t.co/FmvM87k26i. https://t.co/l1X7tMGCQe https://t.co/X0BZiRNW0Y
對於Z世代的成員，在他們進入工作領域時，有什麼好的職業建議？回答者：@RobKingyens, 創始人& CEO at https://t.co/FmvM87k26i. https://t.co/l1X7tMGCQe https://t.co/X0BZiRNW0Y
